text:
Montserrat Carulla i Ventura (September 19, 1930 – November 24, 2020) was a Spanish actress. She was born in Barcelona. Her career began in the 1940s through stage productions. Her best known movie roles were in "Furrows" (1951), "Companys, procés a Catalunya" (1979) and in "The Orphanage" (2007).
Carulla died in Barcelona on November 24, 2020 at the age of 90.
